name: Car City Rally
description:
Rally, racing your dream sports cars on fantastic city environment
Rally, racing your dream sports cars around nice city environment with high speed. More thrilling, excited feeling.
This is very basic of cars racing , rally game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of muscle sports cars car nice fantastic city environment
- Simple controls to control and drive your dream cars car
- Gas, brake buttons to control your racing , rally muscle sports cars
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally muscle sports cars
- Swing your device to control your muscle sports cars steer
- Camera button to change your view of racing, rally muscle sports cars
